extensionDescription.message: Recently is a small Mozilla Thunderbird extension for having the most recent contacts at hand.

popupText.message: Most recent message senders from within the last $lookback$ days

optionsLabelLookback.message: How many days should Recently look back?

donationMessageExtended.message: Recently is Open Source and free to use for you. Please consider to send a donation (via PayPal) or support me on a monthly basis (via Patreon), so I can focus more on what I love: creating useful extensions and tools and spend more time with my family.
